title: Introduction to Company Policies
content: Our company prioritizes a culture of openness and collaboration. All employees are expected to adhere to the company policies outlined in this document.

title: Vacation Request Process
content: To request vacation, employees should fill out the vacation request form available on the company's intranet. The form should be submitted at least two weeks before the intended vacation dates.

title: Meeting Room Reservation
content: To reserve a meeting room, use the online booking system accessible through the company's intranet. Make sure to provide details such as the date, time, and purpose of the meeting.

title: IT Support
content: For IT support, contact the IT helpdesk by sending an email to support@company.com or calling the IT hotline at xxx-xxx-xxxx. Please include a brief description of the issue and your contact information.
